name: SABINE OIL & GAS CORPORATION
description: Sabine Oil & Gas Corporation is an independent oil and natural gas company focused on the acquisition, development, and production of oil and natural gas properties in North America. Founded in 2014, Sabine is headquartered in Houston, Texas, and has a strategic focus on the prolific resources of the Gulf Coast region. The company’s operations are primarily concentrated on the exploration and development of its assets, utilizing advanced technologies and innovative practices to maximize recovery and efficiency. Sabine is committed to responsible resource development, ensuring that its operations are conducted safely and sustainably while minimizing environmental impact. The company has built a strong portfolio of properties that include both operated and non-operated interests, allowing it to effectively manage risk and capitalize on market opportunities. Through strategic partnerships and a disciplined approach to capital allocation, Sabine Oil & Gas aims to deliver value to its stakeholders while contributing to the energy needs of the region. The company emphasizes operational excellence, safety, and community engagement as core tenets of its business philosophy, striving to foster a positive impact on the communities in which it operates. Sabine is focused on enhancing its production capabilities and expanding its reserves through both organic growth and potential acquisitions.

seo.meta_title: Sabine Oil & Gas Corporation | Independent Oil & Natural Gas Company
seo.meta_description: Explore Sabine Oil & Gas Corporation, an independent company focused on oil and natural gas production in North America. Learn about our operations, commitment to sustainability, and strategic growth.

faq.question: What does Sabine Oil & Gas Corporation do?
faq.answer: Sabine Oil & Gas Corporation is engaged in the exploration, development, and production of oil and natural gas properties.

faq.question: Where is Sabine Oil & Gas headquartered?
faq.answer: Sabine Oil & Gas is headquartered in Houston, Texas, USA.

faq.question: When was Sabine Oil & Gas founded?
faq.answer: Sabine Oil & Gas was founded in 2014.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Sabine Oil & Gas Corporation?
faq.answer: Robbie Grubbs is the CEO of Sabine Oil & Gas Corporation.
